name: Power Tool Dragon Giga Drill Breaker X
text:
1 "Morphtronic" Tuner monster + 1 or more "Morphtronic" monsters
This card’s name is treated as "Power Tool Dragon". Once per turn: You can reveal 3 "Morphtronic" cards from your Deck, then your opponent randomly adds 1 of them to your hand, and then shuffle the rest back into your Deck. If this card would be destroyed you can banish 1 "Morphtronic" monster from your GY instead.
